text:
Jacob stood completely still for what felt like an eternity, his eyes fixing on the graphite on the page in her loopy handwriting. This couldn't be happening. After everything they had been through together, she wasn't even willing to give him a chance?

Maybe it wasn't safe. But she wasn't even willing to give it a try? He would respect her decision if she wanted to end it. She knew that. And yet she was closing herself off to even the possibility of growing close to him.
